5. Nature :- You are my wife. Out of the love and affection I have for you, I have a desire to establish some real estate under you. Therefore, I hereby transfer to you, free of charge, the immovable property acquired by my ancestors and inherited by me after their death, in my full and complete possession and right of possession, in my name, having received house tax and paying Panchayat taxes, the immovable property as per the schedule below, valued at Rs. 7,53,000/- in letters seven lakhs fifty three thousand rupees, free of charge, and grant you all the full rights of donation, sale and possession in the deed. I hereby transfer the deed to you on this very day. You shall take possession of the land from now on and enjoy it freely with all the rights of donation, exchange, sale, and payment of Panchayat taxes, etc., as long as you wish, throughout your sons and grandsons' descendants. If you do so, you, your heirs, your assigns, I, my heirs, and my assigns will never be able to make any kind of claim or dispute against you. I, my heirs, and my assigns will be responsible for all claims and disputes that may arise from anyone in the past regarding the land, and I will be able to prevent such claims and disputes at my own expense and establish this land as standing under you without interruption. I have not made any encumbrances or mortgages of any kind to anyone in the name of the applicant. There are no court seizures, court injunctions, court or securities of any kind on the application. All forms related to this are filed herewith. This is a written document of the application for the immovable property given by me.

requiredDocuments.docNumber: Tax Receipt in name of Tupakula Srinu, issued by Ganapavaram Panchayath Secretary, towards House No. 1-22, Vide Transaction ID No. TAX29122025045723774
Gift Settlement Deedexecuted by, Tupakula Srinu, in favour of his Wife Tupakula Lakshmi Vide Doc.No.697 of 2026
Encumbrance Certificate issued towards the schedule property vide Statement No.   139801318

sections.content: As per Registered Documents: 1. The Property bearing House No. 1-22, Assessment No. 22 (old), 200667000017 (New),Comprised in Survey No. 359-F, Situated in Ganapavaram Village, admeasuring an extent of 142.22 Sq. Yds., was Originally Owned by Tupakula Srinu, who acquired property through inheritance from his Ancestors.[Ref:Deed] 2. The aforementioned Tupakula Srinu, executed a Gift Settlement Deed on 27-Jan-2026, registered as document No. 697 of 2026, before the SRO Sattenapalli (729), in favour of his Wife, Tupakula Lakshmi, towards the property measuring 142.22 Sq. Yds., bearing House No. 1-22, Assessment No. 22 (old), 200667000017 (New),Comprised in Survey No. 359-F, Situated in Ganapavaram Village. (B) Additional Documents Supporting the Title : 1. The Property Tax Receipt Transaction ID. No. TAX29122025045723774 , dated 29-Dec-2025, imprinted by the Ganapavaram Panchayath Secretary discloses that Tupakula Srinu, has paid property tax for the period 2025 to 2026, towards house number 1-22. 2. Encumbrance Certificate vide Statement No. 139801318, dated 28-Jan-2026, extracted with respect to the Schedule Property have been provided. We confirm that the said certificate does not reflect any adverse entries.

Whether any of the minor is having interest in the Property offered as mortgage. If so, whether court permission has been obtained for offering the property as security or is yet to be obtained. If not, whether mortgage can be created on the property/ies offered as security. * No
Any Government Claims, Acquisitions, Third Party Claims, Liens etc. and details thereof. * No
Description * Details

Whether the property is affected by any Local Laws, ULC Law, Tenancy Law, Development Plan, State/Central Laws or other regulations. Whether subject property is falls under prohibitory list/ negative list in the records of the Local/State/Central Govt. or not. If Yes, please share details of the same and what precaution to be taken by the Incred Financial Services Limited in this regard. * No, as per given documents

Whether the trust is a private or public trust? * NA

Whether online/computer records are available or not and any verification or cross checking are made and the comments/ findings in this regard. * Yes

In case of missing/absence of any original title deeds of the property what precaution to be taken by the Incred Financial Services Limited in this regard. * NA

sections.content: In view of the aforesaid documents and information furnished before me/us, I/We hereby certify/opinion that Tupakula Lakshmi is/are the absolute owners of the aforesaid schedule property and have an absolute, clear and marketable title over the schedule property and mortgage if created will be perfect and available to the Incred Financial Services Limited towards the liabilities of the Borrower.

sections.content: Note:The report was prepared based on the EC provided by the F.I., as the option to retrieve EC records using the document number & property address parameter is currently unavailable in the Online EC portal. Hence, F.I. to verify the same and proceed as per its internal policy.
